title: No terms of use would be the best possible league of legends
body:
**No TERMS OF USE pleases everyone. **

> The best things in life are free.

replies.body: Oh please explain this one, i got to hear this.
If there were no TOU I'd just start hacking immediately.
Yeah, it really pisses me off that I can't int, use racial slurs or steal other peoples accounts at will!!!! /s

Okay. So lying, stealing, hacking, BMing, being racist/sexist/homophobic, intentionally feeding/trolling, being toxic, attempting to steal from Riot, and any other of a host of things that ***SHOULD ALWAYS BE BANNED IF A GAME WANTS TO BE SUCCESSFUL*** all should be allowed? Is that what you're saying?

No, that is what you are saying.

Without terms of use, you could make a private server and ban anyone for any reason.
[insert some bad thing] is free, don't see many people lining up to get it?
You really don't know what a coincidence is?

"Best things in life are free"

[insert some bad thing] is free, don't see many people lining up to get it?
Coincidence = correspondence in nature or in time of occurrence,
I think it's free to get someone to kick you in your nuts.
